Uses of Package
entropy.configuration.resources

  • Packages that use entropy.configuration.resources 
    Package Description
    entropy.configuration
    This package contains the different elements that model a configuration.
    entropy.configuration.resources  
    entropy.solver.choco  
    entropy.view  
    entropy.view.access  
  • Classes in entropy.configuration.resources used by entropy.configuration 
    Class and Description
    ResourceSpecification
    specifies, for one resource known as its type the capacities of the nodes and the consumptions of the VMs for that resource.
  • Classes in entropy.configuration.resources used by entropy.configuration.resources 
    Class and Description
    CPUConsSpecification
    CPU resource based on VirtualMachine.#getCPUConsumption() and Node.#getCPUCapacity().
    CPUCoresSpecification
    CPU resource, using only the number of nodes
    CPUReservationSpecification 
    GetterBasedSpecification
    resource specification based on the presence of GetterBasedSpecification.getCapacity(Node) and GetterBasedSpecification.getUse(VirtualMachine) methods
    MemConsSpecification
    CPU resource based on VirtualMachine.#getMemoryConsumption() and Node.#getMemoryCapacity().
    MemReservationSpecification 
    ResourceSpecification
    specifies, for one resource known as its type the capacities of the nodes and the consumptions of the VMs for that resource.
    ResourceUse
    Use of a resource in a ReconfigurationProblem.
  • Classes in entropy.configuration.resources used by entropy.solver.choco 
    Class and Description
    ResourceHandler
    The link between a ResourceSpecification and a ReconfigurationProblem, that is, store the data related to the specifications in the problem
    Construct it with its ResourceSpecification, then ResourceHandler.associate(ReconfigurationProblem) it to the problem.
    ResourceUse
    Use of a resource in a ReconfigurationProblem.
  • Classes in entropy.configuration.resources used by entropy.view 
    Class and Description
    ResourceSpecification
    specifies, for one resource known as its type the capacities of the nodes and the consumptions of the VMs for that resource.
  • Classes in entropy.configuration.resources used by entropy.view.access 
    Class and Description
    ResourceHandler
    The link between a ResourceSpecification and a ReconfigurationProblem, that is, store the data related to the specifications in the problem
    Construct it with its ResourceSpecification, then ResourceHandler.associate(ReconfigurationProblem) it to the problem.
